#summary How to compile and run the DL-GRE tool.

= Prerequisites =

 * Apache Ant 1.6.2 or higher
 * Java


= Compiling =

 * Check out the source tree from Google Code
 * Go to the new directory
 * type "ant"

This should produce a file build/lib/DlGre.jar.

You can run the program with the sample data as follows: java -jar build/lib/DlGre.jar.
